pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Fourze (2011, TV show)$(br2)Used as the base item for most Fourze items$(br2)Used on the $(l:misc/blocks/machine_blocks#astroswitch_programmer)Astroswitch Programmer$(/l) to obtain Astroswitches
Found inside the $(l:fourze/structures/rabbit_hutch)Rabbit Hutch$(/l) and $(l:fourze/structures/m_bus)M-BUS$(/l)$(br2)Drops from:$(li)$(l:fourze/mobs/super_gingaoh)Super GingaOh$(/l)
